title: Resonance: A Psychic Romantasy
description: A psychic assassin. A whirlwind romance. Can Sophia survive? As extraordinary abilities emerge in the human race, Sophia Walsh uses hers for good, protecting the innocent, rescuing hostages in war zones, even tracking down nuclear weapons.But not all the gifted are so benevolent, and after a loved one is murdered, she herself could become the next target.Enter Nate, good looks, endearing smile, magnetic charm. He's drawn to Sophia and captures her guarded heart, but can they track down the killer before itâ€™s too late?Resonance is the first book in an award-winning series of steamy urban fantasy and paranormal romance novels. In the spirit of Sherrilyn Kenyon, Kresley Cole, Ilona Andrews, and I.T. Lucas, Resonance invites you to a high-stakes battle for the future.Buy this groundbreaking supernatural romance today!
author: Jennifer Greenhall
